home.intro: As an experienced Product Discovery Coach, I empower organizations to create impactful products. With over a decade of experience leading product companies, I guide teams in transforming their discovery processes to maximize value and minimize waste.

services.workshop.title: Workshops for Teams or Departments
services.workshop.description: Intensive workshops utilizing proven techniques like Design Thinking and Lean Startup to boost idea generation and validation.
services.coaching.teams.title: Coaching Product Teams
services.coaching.teams.description: Coaching product teams or departments to elevate their product discovery skills to a structurally higher level.
services.coaching.leadership.title: Coaching Leadership Teams
services.coaching.leadership.description: Coaching leadership teams to make the necessary transformation towards a product operating model.
about.title: About Me
about.description: Drawing from my extensive experience at KPN, DPG Media, Ahold-Delhaize, and Sissy-Boy, I bring valuable insights in product management and coaching. My diverse background spans both B2B and B2C environments, allowing me to adapt methods to various business models and customer types.
about.approach: My approach is rooted in modern product management principles, focusing on creating products that are not just viable, but valuable, usable, and feasible. I believe in the power of effective discovery to drive innovation and create products that truly resonate with customers.
